doc.title: Alone About the Universe
doc.plot: Mr Thomason is an elderly man living alone in Los Angeles. He is haunted buy his passed where is believes he was abducted by Aliens in the 50s, so keeps to himself. Archie is the young boy of the single manager of the building. Sending most of his time alone Archie gets lonely and bored. When Mr Thomason gives him a window to a friendship Archie jumps at the chance and is excited by what he discovers but Mr Thomason doesn't feel the same
